name: Blaster (xtaloid)
description:
A simple game I threw together in an hour.

You control the ship at the bottom with your mouse. Click or hit Z to fire.

Shoot the spheres bouncing around. Some of them have odd behaviors!

Also note: every shot costs you a few points!

Press P to pause/unpause (and also to release the mouse so you can reposition and resize the window if needed).
